# fluct

## Example

```html
<amp-ad
  width="300"
  height="250"
  type="fluct"
  data-g="{GROUP-ID}"
  data-u="{UNIT-ID}"
  data-tagtype="api"
>
</amp-ad>
```

## Configuration

For more information, please [contact fluct](https://en.fluct.jp/).

### Required parameters

-   `data-g`
-   `data-u`
